title: Scanning files over 10, 000 files and stuck at 33%?
body:
The newest patch (yesterday) patched super quick and easily; but today's 2 skins and an icon caused my league client to scan over 10,000 files and stay at 30%? I've restarted my computer, the client, ran as administrator and am currently repairing the client, but this too is stuck...I've been trying for over two hours. Does anyone know how to fix this issue?
~ thanks
